item.description:
Are you hungry for some Polish food? I'm seeing potato pancakes in the near future. Perhaps pierogies are more to your liking. Now is your chance to join Andrew and Emily and try your luck at some trivia. That's right there will be some trivia during dinner so start studying now. The person who answers the most questions right will get a prize!

Here is the link to the menu and you can also find directions on the website as well. http://cracovia.homestead.com/CracoviaMenuEnglish2.html

Oh and Jaycees get $5 off their meal. If you haven't joined the chapter yet, please do so to take advantage of just one of the perks of being a member.

Hope to see you there!
item.name: International Dinner
